dxf2svg.svg
Class SvgEntityReference

java.lang.Object
  dxf2svg.svg.SvgElement
      dxf2svg.svg.SvgReference
          dxf2svg.svg.SvgEntityReference
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
SvgDimension
public class SvgEntityReference
extends SvgReference

This class encapsulates Dxf INSERT object. Any block reference will be translated into a <g> referencing an entity declaration.

Version:
0.01 - September 13, 2002
Author:
Andrew Nisbet
